column4: hello~ i just downloaded ubuntu onto my usb drive and i downloaded the desktop version and it was intended for the netbook should i redownload that one?
you can just "apt-get install ubuntu-netbook" if you want...
should i download the netbook version or would the desktop one work?
you can install either one over the top of the other with apt, it'll just use more space if you don't remove the useless packages
